attributes.action: Accept & approve the application for a new coal power station at Kingsnorth, Kent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The old coal fired Kingsnorth power station comes to the end of its life in a couple of years time. I ask that the application to build the new coal fired power station at Kingsnorth, Kent be approved to allow work to begin on building the new station & stop holding the current employees futures in limbo. The country needs a mix of power generating stations. Enough energy will not be supplied by wind alone!
